algorithm_technique: Counting spaces and words, then distributing spaces evenly and placing extras at the end.
problem_summary_simple: Evenly distribute spaces between words in a sentence, maximizing spaces between adjacent words.
problem_summary_technical: Count total spaces and words. Calculate max spaces per gap and remaining extra spaces. Rearrange string in-place or build new string.
key_insights: The number of gaps between words is `word_count - 1`.
The optimal distribution of spaces is `total_spaces / (word_count - 1)`.
Any remainder spaces are appended to the end of the string.
